Description:

Job Title: Software Engineer

Requisition: ES20182506-25559

Location: Nashua, NH

Job Description:

Harris Corporation is looking for a motivated Software Engineer to support the development of Software Defined Radio (SDR) and Electronic Countermeasure (ECM) products used to protect soldiers and diplomats across the globe.

Work with industry professionals through the complete software development process including requirements generation, architecture and design, implementation, and system integration and validation.
  • Use industry standard tools and agile development processes
  • Communicate across engineering disciplines
  • Work independently
  • Analyze problems and recommending solutions
  • Debug at the hardware/software interface
  • Support system integration, verification and validation activities.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s Degree and minimum 4 years of prior relevant experience; or, Graduate Degree and a minimum of 2 years of prior related experience.
  • At least 4 years of experience with C/C++
  • Embedded Linux experience
  • Experience with Agile Development Methods and Tools
  • Ability to manage small to medium scale individual projects
  • Object Oriented application development
  • Candidate must be able to obtain a security clearance. In order to obtain a clearance, you must be a US Citizen and show proof of citizenship
Preferred Additional Skills:
  • Linux Driver Development
  • Python
  • Yocto
  • Boot Loaders
  • Cross Compilers
  • Xilinx Zynq / Vivado SDK
  • GIT
  • Comfortable with lab equipment (Oscilloscopes / Spec-A / Sig-Gen)
Please be aware that many of our positions require a security clearance or the ability to obtain one. Security clearances may only be granted to U.S. citizens. In addition, applicants who accept a conditional offer of employment may be subject to government security investigation(s) and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information.

By submitting your résumé for this position, you understand and agree that Harris Corporation may share your résumé, as well as any other related personal information or documentation you provide, with its subsidiaries and affiliated companies for the purpose of considering you for other available positions.

Harris is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.
